page.shortlink: api a5storage getitem as blob function
page.description: Retrieves data from an item in storage and puts the data in a blob variable.
page.syntax: b blob = a5Storage_getItem_as_blob(C connectionString ,C itemName [,* pResult ])

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Character. Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: *. an optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

page.example: dim p3 as p b3 = a5Storage_getItem_as_blob("::storage::Amazon_East","movies/4290.jpg",p3) ?b3.size() ?p3 '= contentType = "image/jpeg" timeTakenMilliseconds = 297
